mt.client.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • mt.client.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for keeping the business logic for the Micro Trader User Interface.

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    java.lang.String nickname)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Asks to the ClientComm to establish a connection to a MicroTrader server.
        Parameters:
        host - Address of the server. For instance "localhost", "192.168.1.1", and or similar.
        nickname - The nickname of the user.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if a connection cannot be established.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Check if an user is currently connected to a host.
        Returns:
        true if currently connected to a host, false otherwise.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Send the disconnects order to the ClientComm.

      • getLoggedUser

        public java.lang.String getLoggedUser()
        Identify the currently logged user.
        Returns:
        the name of the logged user

      • sendOrder

        public void sendOrder(Order order)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Asks the ClientComm interface to send an order to the server.
        Parameters:
        order - The MicroTrader order to send.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendBatchOrders

        public void sendBatchOrders()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • browseMessages

        public void browseMessages()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Browse the orders pending in the ClientComm interface.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the user was disconnected from the server or if there is some error message.
